akn:section.akn:heading: Noncompliance of Federal officials with deadlines; inapplicability of statutes of limitations

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Effect of Noncompliance of Federal Officials With Deadlines.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) If any person seeks to file a complaint or claim with the Secretary, the Merit Systems Protection Board, or a Federal or State court under this chapter alleging a violation of this chapter, there shall be no limit on the period for filing the complaint or claim.
